lead_paragraph: South Korean swimmer Park Tae-hwan, who completed an 18-month doping ban in March, will be unable to compete at the Rio Games after the Korean Olympic Committee opted against amending a rule that tacks three more years onto doping suspensions.

headline.print_headline: Park Rio Hopes Dashed as KOC Stands Firm on Doping Rule
headline.main: Park Rio Hopes Dashed as KOC Stands Firm on Doping Rule
